about_the_game:
To join pre-alpha and get a key join our by clicking image below. :)




Bonk Battle Royal is an action-packed multiplayer game that lets you take on a role of a predator or prey in a natural setting. You'll be competing against others who share the same objective - survival and dominance. But there's a catch! The forest is overseen by an invisible curator who rewards players with victory points for chasing and consuming opponents.

Hide and seek

To win the game, you must find other players and attack them. However, you have the freedom to employ different strategies to achieve your goal. When an animal runs out of health, the curator revives them as a different species, and the cycle continues.
You can try to be invisible while being in the middle of an action: behave naturally, try to be one with the nature.

Try different game modes:

Go solo and dominate the forest as an alpha-predator or team up with up to 4 friends to become a gigachad pack of your dream.

Unique animimals

Every anymal in a game is special. Every one has abilities and movements that suites for a kind: wolf can dash, deer can jump high, etc.

Overall, AUF Battle Royal is an exciting game that promises an immersive experience as you navigate the natural environment and vie for supremacy.

Learn more or if you want to participate in early game development process, join our

name: Bonk Battle Royale

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel i5 8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 or higher screen size recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel i7-9700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 or higher screen size recommended

short_description: Bonk Battle Royale is a multiplayer online game where you should be one with an animal your were given in enchanted forest. Your goal is to act natural as an animal but the same time, guess who is a player to be able to chase them and win.
